observation: I see a language selection overlay is still open on the page covering the main signup form. There are two language dropdown overlays visible - one in the center and one on the right side. I need to close this language overlay to proceed with the residence selection. I can see the close button (X) in the top right of the overlay.
reasoning: As a normal user, I need to dismiss this language overlay that's blocking the main signup form so I can continue with selecting my residence and completing the registration process.
ux_issues: Language overlay appears unexpectedly and blocks the main form

outcome.visual_observation: The language overlay/popup that was visible in the first screenshot (with the purple dashed border around the EN language selector) has been closed/dismissed. The sign-up flow continues with the same 'Select your residence' form still visible, showing the Country/region dropdown, Next button, and 'Already have an account? Log in' link. The background image also changed from the mobile phone with financial app to a person sitting on steps using a phone.
